text: The Cult are a English rock band. They formed in 1981 under the name Southern Death Cult, later renamed to Death Cult in 1983, then were again renamed to their current name The Cult in 1984. == Studio albums == * Dreamtime (1984) * Love (1985) * Electric (1987) * Sonic Temple (1989) * Ceremony (1991) * The Cult (1994) * Beyond Good and Evil (2001) * Born into This (2007) * Choice of Weapon (2012) * Hidden City (2016) Category:English hard rock bands Category:English heavy metal bands Category:English punk bands
title: The Cult
